column2: "Hey! Listen up. I found out an interesting way to get stronger!"
"The best way to get stronger is to get a strong weapon, right?"
"See, all of the higher-ranking ARKS members have their own customized weapons, right? I want one too!"
"That's why I went to ask that weapon craftsman to make me one. But he turned me down!"
"He doesn't have any passion anymore or some kind of dumb excuse like that."
"Hey, why don't you try asking him?"
"What we need are strong weapons, right? See if he'll make me one."
